messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: UHHH oh shit guys uhh cap here stay safe and make us rich cap out

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Easter Workspace Lima's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Easter Workspace Lima. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The emergency shuttle has been accelerated due to on-board centcomm commander request.
